title: Fully renovated, washer and dryer in unit, spacious 2 bedroom
posting_body: NoHo Centre offers convenience and luxury in the heart of Valley Village.

You'll find spacious one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with washers and dryers, conveniently located just minutes from the 170 and 101 freeways, as well as shopping, restaurants, entertainment and award-winning local schools.
Our apartment homes are comfortable, spacious and luxuriously appointed with all the modern amenities.
We are pet friendly, offer spacious outdoor nooks that expand your living space, and provide tons of on-site amenities.
The perfect place to call home, NoHo Centre gives you a place to nest in beautiful, exciting Los Angeles.
CONTACT US TODAY AND SEE WHAT SETS US APART!Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798
